full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Mr. J.E. DATE 12/09/04 TIME 240 A.M. P.M. additional_notes: The document contains four 'Important Message' forms with handwritten notes and a government exhibit stamp. Some phone numbers are redacted.
